title: Courgette and mint salad
ingredients: ['1 small courgette, sliced into rounds, ribbons or strands', '1 small yellow squash, sliced into rounds', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
